COIN OF OLYMPUS

THE COIN OF THE GODS IS HERE

TRUST THE GODS' COIN AND BE REWARDED.

FOR EVERY HUMAN THAT INVESTS, THE GODS WILL RETURN THE FAVOR.

COL is a token that increases value over time as every transaction causes Hades to burn 2%. The generous gods return the favor by donating 5% of every transaction to the Binance Charity to help with the worldly adversities of humankind.

BSCSCAN PANCAKESWAP POOCOIN RUGSCREEN

MOUNT OLYMPUS

Day 256, Year 4.534B....

Zeus, the God of Thunder, known to visit mankind often, spreading his DNA to each and every beautiful greek woman, noticed that the number of people offering their praises has steeply declined over the past 3 years. "What might be the reason?" He asked himself repeatedly, until he decided to come pay a visit.

Zeus came down from the heavens with his bolt and shouted to the mortals. "You! All of you! Have you forgotten about the graces you have received from the gods that you have spared no time for prayer?" A greek noble answered Zeus in a very calm and subtle voice. We have not stopped praying, but we have been praying to a new God now. A God who is decent and just, and teaches us how to think smart to make our life better. Something that the olympian gods have kept from us since the beginning.

"Who is that God you are talking about?" Zeus asked. "CZ and his greatest creation, BNB." The man replied. BNB is a coin that humans trade to earn a living. "A coin you say?" Zeus asked. "A coin so valuable that it can grant your dreams.", the man said.

Zeus laughs so hard with his fist closed and everyone can hear the rumbling in the skies. "If you pray just to have a coin, i will make you beg for one." Zeus throws his bolt to the moon shattering its very core. Zeus pulls the moon's core and crushes it with his fist. Through his mighty hands, he created a coin. He named it the Coin of Olympus.

COIN OF OLYMPUS

Zeus crafted this coin and promised that people will come begging for it over time. Grab what you can now before it is too late. Zeus, despite the foolishness of mortals, is still a graceful god. A part of every deal made with COL will be donated to the Binance Charity to aide people who are suffering.

ZEUS' GOAL:

The Coin of Olympus is aimed by Zeus to become a token worth begging for. But Zeus is just and graceful despite the attitude of the mortals towards the gods of olympus. Crafted with the use of the moon's core, this coin is meant to last an eternity. It will serve as an aide to suffering mortals by contributing to the Binance Charity, fueling the efforts being done the entity.
